doc:
Steve Forrest (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steve_Forrest_(actor) 0 Steve Forrest (born William Forrest Andrews; September 29, 1925 – May 18, 2013) was an American actor who was well known for his role as Lt. Hondo Harrelson in the short-lived television series S.W.A.T. which ran from 1975 to 1976. He was also known for his performance in Mommie Dearest (1981). Steve_Forrest ( born William_Forrest_Andrews ; September_29_,_1925 – May_18_,_2013 ) was an_American_actor who was_well_known for his_role as Lt._Hondo_Harrelson in the_short-lived_television_series_S.W.A.T. which ran from 1975 to 1976 . He was_also_known for his_performance in Mommie_Dearest ( 1981_) .
